x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact: This way an organization can manage/track corporate domestic/international travels for its employees easily without the need of multiple separate applications for various phases of the travel requests raised by the employees.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement:
All big Organizations need to plan/manage their employees' domestic/international corporate travels and typically they use different separate applications to raise travel requests, track the requests, request for VISAs and book the tickets etc. Organizations can use their ServiceNow platform to have an application where an employee can raise travel request, which goes for approvals and post necessary approvals travel team can manage/track the request in ServiceNow. The team can be redirected to VISA portal for applying for VISA (if required) and to the approved travel booking sites for booking travel tickets/hotels and all.
Management can have reports on quarterly/half-yearly/yearly basis to have sufficient budget allocated on travel expenses.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

Now Mobile/Service catalog – for employees to raise travel requests and track those throughout the lifecycle.

Workspace – for travel team to work on different phases of the travel requests.

Integration/Integration hub– to integrate with approved travel booking site and relevant VISA portals.

Knowledge Management – to store knowledge guides, policies, best practices.

Notifications (Push/SMS) – to notify employees when the status of any request changes or gets approved till the tickets are booked and getting all the necessary staffs to travel.

Platform Analytics – to report on the travel requests and expenses for the organization to plan its travel budget.

NA
